solution_line_template: 60% of the students pay for the lunch because {total_percent} - {free_lunch_percent} = <<{total_percent}-{free_lunch_percent}={paying_students_percent}>>{paying_students_percent}
30 students pay for lunch because {total_students} x {paying_students_percent_decimal} = <<{total_students}*{paying_students_percent_decimal}={num_paying_students}>>{num_paying_students}
These students pay $7 for their lunch because {total_cost_to_feed_all} / {num_paying_students} =<<{total_cost_to_feed_all}/{num_paying_students}={cost_per_paying_student}>>{cost_per_paying_student}
